entry.title: WIND WARNING , Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 3:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: E 33 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy with flurries beginning before morning. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming west 30 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
